#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <string.h>
#define MID(mid,l) {if(l%2==0) mid=l/2; else mid=l/2;}

using namespace std;

int main(){
    string a;
    int l, mid, index;
    bool flag;      // flag - the no. is greater than given.
    register int i, j;

    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--){
        flag=true;
        cin >> a;            // Input.
        l=a.length();
        int li=l-1;
        for(register int i=0; i<l; i++){
            if(a[i]!=a[li-i]){
                flag=false;
                break;
            }
        }

        if(flag)
            printf("YES\n");
        else
            printf("NO\n");
    }       // test case,
    return 0;
}
